import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; export default function CartScreen(props) { const {state}=props.history.location.state const id =props.history.location.state.id const qty =props.history.location.state.qty return (
{id}
); // ( /* < div > < h1 > cart screen < /h1>

ADD TO CART: PRODUCT ID: { id }, Qty: { qty } < /p> < div className = "row top" > < div className = "col-2" > < h1 > Shopping Cart < /h1>

  • < div className = "row" > < img src = { products.slice(id - 1, id)[0].image } className = "small" / > < div > < div className = "min-30" > < Link to = "" > { products.slice(id - 1, id)[0].name } < /Link> < / div > < / div > < div className = "row" > < div > { qty } < /div>
    < select > {[...Array(products.slice(id - 1, id)[0].countInStock).keys()].map((x) => (< option key = { x + 1 } value = { x + 1 } > { x + 1 } < /option> )) } < /select > < /div > < /div > < div className = "row" > { products.slice(id - 1, id)[0].price } $ < /div> < div > < button onclick = "" > delete < /button>< /div > < /div > < /li > < li > < h2 > Subtotal < /h2> < / li > < button type = "button" onClick = "" className = "primary block" > < Link to = '/shipping' > order < /Link>< / button > < / ul > < / div > < /div> < /div> */ //); }
